arts.ttl: Ermedin Demirović rescues point for VfB Stuttgart in Bremen thriller
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart's Ermedin Demirović forced an impressive Werder Bremen side to settle for a 2-2 draw in a thrilling encounter on Bundesliga Matchday 12. Stuttgart, however, refused to be deterred and found their equaliser in the 20th minute through Demirović .

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Leipzig crisis deepens, Stuttgart draw, Freiburg snap skid
arts.sum: In the most significant result of the latest set of Bundesliga 15:30 kickoffs, VfL Wolfsburg dismantled wobbling RB Leipzig with a 5-1 shellacking. VfB Stuttgart (wobbling themselves) could only manage a draw while Freiburg, Leverkusen, and Augsburg all earned wins.

arts.ttl: Werder Bremen vs VfB Stuttgart preview: Top six ambitions on show
arts.sum: Two sides eyeing a push into the Bundesliga’s top six face off at the Weserstadion on Saturday afternoon, as Werder Bremen welcome Stuttgart for an intriguing showdown.

arts.ttl: Preview: Werder Bremen vs. Stuttgart - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Werder Bremen and Stuttgart, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
After European games for some German clubs in midweek, it is a return to Bundesliga action this weekend with Alex Jack taking us through all nine games.
